reviews.text: The chef clearly knows how to bring out the best in ingredients. Meals here are both tasty and beautiful. The workers are outstanding; greeting warmly and accommodating requests with smiles. Charges more than it should, though the setting works. The concept here is notably different.

Love this place! The Classic burger was exceptional and the house sauce they use really brings out the flavor profile.  Great decor and I am super happy with their music selection, being a fan of 70s and 80s.  Our server Alfie gave great attention and was friendly, with a great sense of humor and urgency.  Will definitely return to try their other signature burgers!

You pay for excellence and that's exactly what you get. Staff members pay attention to small details. The food surpassed usual remarkable quality. The kitchen delivers dependably and the staff delivers kindly. Just eat here - you'll plan future visits.
Best Burgers we have ever had! Super nice atmosphere and very good service!
Another winning burger

ComÃ­ la mejor hamburguesa de NYC. En esta ciudad hay grandes locales con igual calidad. Porque la experiencia fue superior? Por el servicio a cargo de MÃ­a!. El toque humano, profundo y sensible hace que un producto sea superior, y cuando estÃ¡ una sonrisa con paz la experiencia se transforma en inolvidable
Najlepszy burger w NY. ObsÅ‚uga bardzo przyjazna i super atmosfera. Bardzo polecam!
Muy buena opciÃ³n para comer una hamburguesa, sandwich, burrito, aros de cebollaâ€¦todo estÃ¡ buenÃ­simo. Super atentos y el precio de lo mejor segÃºn estÃ¡ ahora mismo NY (por las nubes)

Good deals on seasonal products.

Male waiter played â€œfriendlyâ€ but he could not play all today. (Oct03, 2025)
When my friend ordered and  said â€œno cheeseâ€ on burger, his  face was stunned and his eyes rolled up. He should not do it in front of guests.
We ordered  fried carmalis then we didnâ€™t need a French fry. He didnâ€™t like it. â€œOh, no French fry. Ok okâ€
After meal, he asked â€œany dessert or drink?â€, and we said â€œno thank youâ€. He looked like not satisfied.
He judged us as a non suitable guests for him.
The other female waitress and males waiter with glasses were kind.
The restaurant should let the male waiter without glasses to a training again.
Trato excelente y comida excepcional. Un sitio muy acogedor
Excelentes y deliciosas hamburguesas a precios muy mÃ³dico

The hotel guy recommended this burger spotâ€”and you always take the hotel guyâ€™s advice! Weâ€™re smash burger fans, and Jackson Hole did not disappoint. Holy greatness. The burger was so good we ate it before we could even snap decent photos (no regrets). We grabbed a few shots of the chicken & waffles, cheese sticks and the fun vibes inside. Even the complimentary pickles won us over. Crispy onion rings? Chefâ€™s kiss. This place is an easy yes!
Great burgers, cool retro vibes, and friendly service. Curly sweet potato fries were great. Loved the New Yorker burger
Great staff, amazing food!!! Had the empire burger
Great food!
Jeffrey and the staff are very courteous and knowledgeable , awesome food and drinks , had a great time.
buenisimas hamburguesas y el servicio genial, pero hacia mucho frio, aunque nos bajaron el aire hacia mucho frio, pero la comida y servicio perfectos.
Unsure how they keep hanging on
Too crowded.  Waitresses absent minded. Burger was ok, or maybe I was just too hungry...
il vero hamburger americano. ogni volta che sono a new york vengo qui. Non câ€™Ã¨ paragone con gli altri ristoranti â€œda instagram/tiktokâ€

We found this place to be quirky and fun. The layout is very a-typical but gives for smaller more quiet dining areas. We loved the decor and retro items and the staff were attentive and friendly.
The menus themselves were very cool and importantly, the food was delicious. We were a party of 4, we all went for burgers, but the menu has some other lovely options too.
The burgers were juicy, fresh and flavourful. Some great flavour combos - difficult to make our minds up on what to have. We all enjoyed!
Hamburguesa espectacular, un lugar donde no encuentras turistas. DecoraciÃ³n muy curiosa.
â€œThis is a terrible restaurant. Their employees are very rude, especially the healthy Black guy at the counter who has disgusting behavior.â€

I recently dined at Jakso Hole, and the food was truly exceptional. Each dish was thoughtfully crafted with vibrant flavors and fresh ingredients that delighted the palate. The presentation was elegant yet inviting, striking a perfect balance between style and comfort. Every bite revealed a depth of flavor, from wellâ€‘seasoned proteins to perfectly balanced side dishes. The menuâ€™s creativity shone through in both classic favorites and imaginative house specials. Overall, the culinary experience was memorable, offering a harmonious blend of taste and visual appealâ€”an inviting and satisfying meal Iâ€™d happily return for.

Burger sind ok .. 6X Burger 4X Pommesund 4X GetrÃ¤nke 190$  bezahlt... die Ambiente hat mir gut gefallen es ist sehr rustikal amerikanisch..kÃ¶nnte ein bisschen sauberer sein. Nicht schÃ¶n fand ich aus der Decke rausgefallene Kabel .. also nicht nach oben schauen.

Hem tornat desprÃ©s de molts anys. La primera sorpresa ha estat trobar-lo buit un diumenge a la nit. Segona sorpresa, tot i parlar en AnglÃ¨s la cambrera ens ha pres el pÃ¨l. Hamburgueses mal fetes. Patates fregides que eren oli amb patates. Fingers de pollastre incomestibles que eren goma amb oli. Un desastre dâ€™experiÃ¨cia.
The nicest staff with the best burgers and fries Iâ€™ve ever had in NYC. I did take out with them and their chicken caesar wrap is super yummy too. Definitely a Murray Hill staple :)
Spectacular, give 14 of them

Fui por las criticas que tenÃ­a este sitio por sus hamburguesas, y la verdad que se quedan cortas, las hamburguesas estÃ¡n deliciosas asÃ­ como las bebidas. El Staff tambiÃ©n era muy educado y servicial.
Too expensive. Mac n cheese was store noodles with cheap cheese. Burger was mid-tier. Kind of squishy.
Far and away one of the best hamburgers I've had. They will mix and match your fries if you ask them.

The Food,Service and hospitality was 5 Stars and Alfie my server was awesome greeted me with a smile and offered many options and and to try other dishes Bacon Cheeseburger and Well done fries just delicious thank you
Absolutely the best hamburger I have ever had in 62 years.  Would highly recommend the boss burger or the brie blueberry.

One of the worst burgers I've ever had. Everything was totally underseasoned, and the burger itself was absolutely colossal with everything on it totally out of proportion to the serving. Sometimes less is more. Especially when what you're getting more of is bland beef that just dwarfs the condiments on the burger. Got it with waffle fries that had been so overcooked that they shattered in my mouth. It's hard to do much worse than this.

Great place to eat! Everything was great.

This place has one of the best burgers Iâ€™ve ever had. We went there for late lunch / early dinner and each of us chose a different burger. And all of them were pretty good. I was not able to eat the whole thing because it was too much. We will definitely go back.
This was easily the best burger I have ever had.
The best burgers in NYC ğŸ¥¹â€¦
Nice burger

The coziness of this restaurant is unrivaled.

Be warned you WILL have to run six miles after you eat one of the burgers. Itâ€™s worth it though.

They notably have TVs only in the â€˜barâ€™ section and none anywhere else.

Good restaurant in NY so thereâ€™s that :)  Quiet because we were there on Tuesday at 3:00 pm
My favorite place to spend game day not only for the atmosphere but for their amazing food too. I love their burgers so much and the staff is so friendly.

Jackson hole has the best truffle smash burger of all time!!! And their wings are sooo fire especially with their house made ranch!! And they give you a bowl of homemade pickles right when you sit down and who doesnâ€™t love pickles. The staff are so kind and the owner is super awesome!!!! 10/10 recommend this place.

Iâ€™m saddened by the decline of Jackson Hole locations in Manhattan. This has been my favorite joint for burgers for as long as Iâ€™ve known about them. On my latest trip to NYC I made to this final Manhattan outpost. The Berger are still as juicy and delicious as always. If youâ€™re looking for a smash burger - donâ€™t come here - they do it because itâ€™s trendy but they are known for this big-ass juicy burgers and thatâ€™s what you should get.
The dining room is no frills and the service can be spotty. Even though they give you an iPad menu - you cannot order from it or pay your bill so really not sure the point of it.
There were so many fun options for burgers. My family got a variety of options, and no one was disappointed! All the burgers were huge, and cooked perfectly.
Nice place for some burgers!

I love the Jackson Hole. I have visiting their own location on the upper east side for many years, so was pleasantly surprised to find this one. Though, I worried it could be as good as the original.

I was wrong to worry.

The burger was amazing. Perfectly cooked. The steak fries were done right. Not soggy or burnt. Service was quick, friendly, and enjoyable.

Basically, it a great little sibling to the original. And its only in that comparison, that it loses just a little. Its a smaller location, and missing some of the extreme variety of the original. But thats it. The food is just as good.

This location of the Jackson Hole is worthy of the name and is a great stop for burgers. Highly recommended.
Mia y el resto. Porciones abundantes, hamburguesas excelentes, buena mÃºsica y la atenciÃ³n de Mia que es un plus excepcional!!!

This place has decent food, i really recommend the belgium waffle dessert and i highly do not recommend the chicken parm sandwhich. Overall the food was decent. The service could be better and friendlier though.

Best burger I've had the pleasure of eating! Tons of options to choose from! The burgers are big and they are loosely packed for a bite that you won't forget! (Over packed burgers have the texture of hockey pucks)

Super low-key spot perfect for dining and chatting.

If you in the mood for burgers, you came to the right place !

This place has cool disco Midwest feel to the joint. They have some interesting choices when it comes to the burgers. Slightly on the pricey side but both PB&J and truffle smash burgers were delicious. Our servers were very attentive as well.

If in the area check it out

Came here after my fiancÃ©e recommended it. The drink was sweet and strong but not my type. I ordered a side of mushrooms and they were okay. Needed seasoning. I got the mac n cheese burger and it was okay. The mac was creamy and the onion added a nice touch but the bu eh er itself needed something. It was a very generous size though. My fiancÃ©e got the steak sandwich and was smaller compared to the burgers. He said it was good. I did like it as well. My BIL got a regular New Yorker burger and said the same that the burger needed more seasoning but it was good. My FIL got the steak and my MIL got the steak salad and said the portions are small. They both thought the food was okay. Overall I probably wouldnâ€™t return and was disappointed as the Englewood NJ location has one of my favorite soups and really good entrees! The decorations was cute and the waitress was nice. We WERE NOT expecting the service charge of $31. Iâ€™m not sure if thatâ€™s a NYC but caught us by surprise.

Found my new Burger date Spot. This vibe is giving old school diner meets western saloon and theyâ€™re serving up the thickest, craziest burgers you can imagine!

Two of the burgers I had here were top burgers I have had in NYC and ones I will be back for! If youâ€™re a burger lover like me, this is the place to check out. Tons of cool combos and your choice between bison, turkey or beef and made to order.

My favorite dishes:

-Mac and Cheese Burger: Topped with truffle mac and cheese, chopped bacon, cheddar and onion ring

-Anytime Brunch Burger: Smoked imported gouda, truffle mayo, over easy egg on a warm toasted croissant

-Brie Berry Burger: Brie cheese, bacon topped with house-made blueberry compote

-Red Velvet Cake

Excelent place to have dinner or lunch in typical american setting.
Staff is very helpful.
Prices are reasonable, tip fees go from 10 % and above

My husbands words â€˜that is one of the best things Iâ€™ve ever put in my mouthâ€™! Absolutely amazing burgers. Onion rings and sweet potato fries were simply the best. We had the PB&J Smash - peanut biter and bacon jam. Yes you read right! This is a must try burger place if you are in NY!

Also Gluten free buns available :-)
Excelente hamburgueserÃ­a. La carnes estÃ¡ espectacular y las hamburguesas inmejorables. Recomendable la de blueberry aunque todas estÃ¡n muy bien.

No sÃ© si hay alguna ciudad en el mundo en el que se sirvan mÃ¡s hamburguesas que en Nueva York, ni cuÃ¡ntas pueden servirse en un dÃ­a, pero estoy seguro de que no hay muchos sitios mejores que este para probarlasâ€¦
El sitio es espectacular, con tantas opciones como se te ocurran para elegir. TÃ­picas hamburguesas americanas de tamaÃ±o XXL con las que disfrutas manchÃ¡ndote la cara entera de queso y sus salsas. La carne, increÃ­ble. Totalmente recomendable.
SalÃ­ de aquÃ­ hablando como Aznar cuando fue a Texas.

Super ambiance, beaucoup de choix tant pour la musique que pour les burgers. Service merveilleux avec une Ã©quipe de folie.
Merci encore pour ce bon moment. (PrÃ©voir des piÃ¨ces de 25Â¢).

I found this place after a exhausting day of biking and a broad search of succulent burgers in NYC.

I found out they have a big variety of humongous burgers and after calling the restaurant, they were probably the only ones receiving a group of 6 on a Friday night without reservation, and zero wait time.

After I ate, I was actually shocked that such a wonderful restaurant didn't have a line of people waiting to be seated.

The service was excellent, the waiters were super professional, extremely friendly, incredibly attentive. We were seated at the very last table inside the restaurant, and they would make rounds every certain minutes to make sure everything was perfect and we didn't need anything else. Loved the ambiance!!

Food was more than we desired!!!
The burgers were as massive as we wanted them to be, as well as incredibly fresh and tremendously appetizing.

This place is a gem!!!
I can't wait to come back!!

Had The Goat burger here and would definitely come back! The vibe of the restaurant is just like what one would expect from Manhattan - casual, lively, and stylish. The burger's size is HUGE and will keep you full for the hours to come. The ingredients are also of good quality and they are seasoned well. One drawback is that the service is rather slow. So, more like a place to come enjoy the food and the conversation, but not ideal for quick bites.

Endroit sympa et calme. Service gÃ¢chÃ©e par cette pratique sans scrupule Ã  imposer le montant du pourboir sans informer donc si vous ne pretez pas attention vous vous retrouvez avec 1 facturz Ã©levÃ©. Et en l ayant fait remarquer la serveuse s est braquÃ©e et est devenue froide et dÃ©sagrÃ©able.
Petite deception en ce qui concerne le repas car a la vue des commentaires on s attend Ã  beaucoup mieux...  La viande Ã©tait bonne et trÃ¨s bien cuite. Les frites de patates douces sont les meilleurs que j ai mangÃ© Ã  ce jour .
Outstanding.  Atmosphere is fantastic,  food was fabulous! Love the option to choose your protein/burger base.

Huge portions and decent prices for burgers that would have been insane if the patty just had a bit more salt. Roughly 8 oz. patty and 15+ different topping options and are the burgers are under $20. The ambience also had a nice old western feel that was quite nice. There was even a old school music selector, where you could put a quarter and choose your own music for the entire room.

They also have spiked milkshakes and desserts which my friend enjoyed, while I had the Jackson hole Sundae which was a 16 oz, vanilla ice cream, chocolate cake and fudge sundae for just $9 (a great deal that also tasted good).

They also have salads and other options like sandwiches and entrees apart from the appetizers. A bit more salt and it would have definitely been 5-star.

Mon mari se souvenait de ce nom de restaurant alors qu'il Ã©tait venu Ã  NY en 2001. Sur ces conseils nous y sommes allÃ©s et y avons trÃ¨s bien mangÃ©! Le service Ã©tait trÃ¨s sympathique. Nous avons fortement apprÃ©ciÃ© notre dÃ©jeuner.

Sitio recomendado para ir a comer/cebar en Nueva York, la comida muy buena, platos grandes y variedad amplia de carta. Los entrantes estaban buenos, las hamburguesa todavÃ­a mejor y cuando creÃ­amos que no podÃ­a mejorar, los postres terminaron de redondear una gran comida. Precios ajustados al nivel de vida de Nueva York, sales satisfecho. Tienes una mÃ¡quina en la mesa para seleccionar la mÃºsica.

My boyfriend & I found this place on instagram & we are so happy about it. The place is such a vibe & the burgers are 10/10. We both ordered & loved the truffle smash burger with sweet potato fries. My bf enjoyed their wings as well & they also have the best chocolate lava meltdown cake for dessert â¤ï¸

We came in on a Friday and immediately were seated. They have great decor inside, which creates a cozy atmosphere. Their menu is on a tablet, which is something Iâ€™ve never seen before! They have so many options to pick from. Both burgers were really flavorful and delicious. We enjoyed their sweet potato fries as well.

GerÃ§ekten hayatÄ±mda yediÄŸim en iyi hamburgerlerden birini yedim. O kadar lezzetliydi ki fotoÄŸrafÄ±nÄ± Ã§ekemeden bitirdiÄŸimi farkettim :) Ã§alÄ±ÅŸanlar son derece kibar ve gÃ¼leryÃ¼zlÃ¼. AyrÄ±ca ortam da Ã§ok keyifli. Herkese tavsiye ederim.

Okay, so this is an experience. Even for the price, which is really not bad for what you get. I will say go on an empty stomach. I was good for the whole day. Glad to have finally gone as I kept on hearing about it from my friends.

Der beste Burger den ich je gegessen habe. Mit groÃŸem Abstand! Hier spielen das Flair und die anderen UmstÃ¤nde natÃ¼rlich auch eine groÃŸe Rolle. Aber im Vergleich zu anderen LÃ¤den konnte man es sich hier richtig gutgehen lassen.  Viele Biere, sogar unter 10â‚¬. Richtig ordentliche Portionen und ein unschlagbarer Geschmack. Absoluter Tipp fÃ¼r alle hungrigen NewYorkReisenden.

Great service and super lovely staff!
Burgers not my favorite.. the bread to meat ratio was pretty off.. way too much meat and then even more overwhelming with toppings and the meat doesnâ€™t holdâ€¦

If thereâ€™s a better burger, I havenâ€™t had it. The onion rings went quickly, too. And ice cold Stella on tap. A nice fam lunch. Wait staff was very friendly, too. Only reason not 5 stars is the downstairs is beyond humid and hot and not clean. When youâ€™re in the city, you donâ€™t want to have to hold it in, and I wouldnâ€™t want to go down there again.

Food: 6 out of 10
Service: 7.5 out of 10
Communication: 3 out of 10
Location: 8 out of 10

This was an interesting experience to say the least. I called ahead of time to reserve a table for my friends and I, and it was all good to until we got there. No one seems to communicate with each other, which kind of sucks because I would think a business thrives off of communication.

The food was alright, I wanna say it was a 4 out of 10. My girlfriendâ€™s steak was good though, I liked it. That was an 8 out 10. My waiter was super friendly and attentive. He was unsure of the menu from time to time but he was good for the most part. The overall vibe of the restaurant was a 6 out of 10. There were a few other things that I didnâ€™t enjoy and some that were really cool.
